channel.title: Comments on: Finally, I can preview my video now

item.title: By: Hang
item.dc:creator: Hang
item.description: By the way, I copied codes from http://groups.google.com/group/comp.lang.ada/browse_thread/thread/330113ca111da154/379d924fb1b935f3?hl=zh-CN&ie=UTF-8&q=comp.lang.ada+Hex+ouput#379d924fb1b935f3 for convert numbers to hex string, I will write my own if there is any copyright concerns, and even if there is no such a concern at all I will still think about doing some my own stuffs (practicing generic program).
item.content:encoded: By the way, I copied codes from http://groups.google.com/group/comp.lang.ada/browse_thread/thread/330113ca111da154/379d924fb1b935f3?hl=zh-CN&ie=UTF-8&q=comp.lang.ada+Hex+ouput#379d924fb1b935f3 for convert numbers to hex string, I will write my own if there is any copyright concerns, and even if there is no such a concern at all I will still think about doing some my own stuffs (practicing generic program).
